name: Hare (itch)
description:
Ivan is lost in the pit of the paradox where he has to do some business for a god (aka, dog).

This is just a little shitty game that I'm doing in my spare time so, play and and please give me your feedback!

I'm planning to update it as time passes.

Some things that I'm working on right now (ordered by priority): - A better pause; - Speed run mode; - One New Area; - Controller Support; - Seed for runs; - Score system; - Multiplayer; - Android version;

You can play it for free at: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/699888

Controls:

- [Space]: Jump, float and dash

- [Q]: Special

- [<]: Go slower (key left)

- [>]: Go faster (key right)

- [V]: dash downwards (key down)
